snippet.title: Rover Mechanic Simulator — Full Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Play Now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/864680/
The game is going out of Early Access on November 12th 2020!

As an Engineer - crew member of one of the first Mars colonies - you are responsible for repairing and maintaining Mars Rovers. In this advanced simulator you will learn the internal details of various Mars Rovers and their components.

Follow Pyramid Games for more updates and learn more about our other games!
http://pyramid.games
https://twitter.com/pyramidlab
https://www.facebook.com/PyramidGamesLab/
https://www.instagram.com/pyramid.games/
https://www.youtube.com/user/ThePyramidLab
https://store.steampowered.com/developer/pyramidgames

©️ Pyramid Games 2020

#Simulation #Mechanic #Mars #Rover #Game
